segments.advisor_message: So, let’s talk about your income sources. Can you tell me what you earn and how often you get it?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, I think I make, like, um, you know, around 2000? But it’s, uh, like, after taxes, I guess? And, um, it’s every month, or well, every few weeks? Also, oh, let me see, I think I have, um, something for renting, but, that—um, I don’t really remember the details, it’s like rental income or sumthing. So, that’s part of it, too. Uh...
